item.title: alloydb-create-instance
item.description:
About

The alloydb-create-instance tool creates a new AlloyDB instance (PRIMARY or READ_POOL) within a specified cluster. It is compatible with http source. This tool provisions a new instance with a public IP address.

Permissions & APIs Required: Before using, ensure the following on your GCP project:

  1. The AlloyDB API is enabled.
  2. The user or service account executing the tool has the following IAM roles:
    • roles/alloydb.admin: To create and manage AlloyDB instances.
